extractor

Class InformationExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • extractor.InformationExtractor

  • public class InformationExtractor
extends Object
    Extract information from unstructured text indexed as fixed length word window based paragrpahs. Uses queries to retrieve these paragraphs and 'look for' specific answers.
    Author:
    Debasis

        Parameters:
        refDocId - A given document id.
        ws - Window size
        Returns:
        An in-memory index of passages which are similar to a query but not annotated.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractInformationFromDoc

        public InformationUnit extractInformationFromDoc(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader paraReader,
                                                 int docId,
                                                 InformationUnit iu,
                                                 boolean applyTextClassifier)
                                          throws Exception
        Extract information pertaining to the specified information unit object 'iu'. Reads the window sizes to be used from the properties file. Performs, in general, the following actions.
        1. Constructs a query from the 'iu' attribute. Whether or not the query is learned from the annotations or simply read from the configuration file, depends on the property values and also on the way the 'iu' parameter is configured.
        2. Constructs a Lucene 'IndexSearcher' object. Uses 'LMJelinekMercerSimilarity' retrieval model for extracting top-ranked passages.
        3. Normalize the retrieval model scores for a consistent threshold computation.
        4. For value extraction type attributes, reranks top ranked passages based on the distances of the candidate answers from the query terms.
        5. Aggregates the similarity scores across multiple retrieved passages.
        Parameters:
        paraReader - An IndexReader Lucene object pointing to the index where the passages are stored.
        docId - Document from which to extract information.
        iu - Contains information o which attribute to extract.
        applyTextClassifier - Whether to apply a trained text classifier (Naive Bayes) to predict the output (Note: This only applies for BCT extraction and the calling function has to make sure that the value of the 'iu' parameter is of type 'AbstractDetectPresenceAttribute'.
        Returns:
        An 'InformationUnit' object populated with the extracted value.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractInformationFromDoc

        public InformationUnit extractInformationFromDoc(int docId,
                                                 InformationUnit iu,
                                                 boolean applyTextClassifier)
                                          throws Exception
        Used in the stand-alone default flow. Values are taken from the properties file.
        Parameters:
        docId - Document from which to extract information.
        iu - Contains information o which attribute to extract.
        applyTextClassifier - Whether to apply a trained text classifier (Naive Bayes) to predict the output (Note: This only applies for BCT extraction and the calling function has to make sure that the value of the 'iu' parameter is of type 'AbstractDetectPresenceAttribute'.
        Returns:
        An 'InformationUnit' object populated with the extracted value.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractInformationFromDoc

        public InformationUnit extractInformationFromDoc(int docId,
                                                 InformationUnit iu,
                                                 String[] wsizes,
                                                 boolean applyTextClassifier)
                                          throws Exception
        Used in the API flow, where one wishes to override the values of window sizes from the interface. Other configuration values are taken from the properties file.
        Parameters:
        docId - Document from which to extract information.
        iu - Contains information o which attribute to extract.
        wsizes - A comma separated list of different window sizes to employ for passage retrieval.
        applyTextClassifier - Whether to apply a trained text classifier (Naive Bayes) to predict the output (Note: This only applies for BCT extraction and the calling function has to make sure that the value of the 'iu' parameter is of type 'AbstractDetectPresenceAttribute'.
        Returns:
        An 'InformationUnit' object populated with the extracted value.
        Throws:
        Exception

                                 ExtractedInfoIndexer ieIndexer)
                          throws Exception
        Loops through all the documents and performs information extraction.
        Parameters:
        toExtract - Contains information o which attribute to extract.
        ieIndexer - Used to save the extracted information as part of a Lucene index (functionality implemented in this object passed as parameter).
        Throws:
        Exception

      • doFold

        public RefComparison doFold(InformationUnit toExtract,
                            CVFoldGenerator fg,
                            int k)
                     throws Exception
        Runs cross-validation treating a part of the dataset for training and the other for testing.
        Parameters:
        toExtract - The attribute to extract. Note that the folds are different for each attribute depending on the number of documents which are annotate with this attribute.
        fg - A 'CVFoldGenerator' object.
        k - The value of k for k-fold cross-validation (typically set to 5 or 10).
        Returns:
        A 'RefComparison' object which accumulates the evaluation metrics.
        Throws:
        Exception
